import { useState } from 'react'; import { Box, Button, Card, CardContent, Grid, Table, TableBody, TableCell, TableHead, TableRow, TextField, Typography } from '@mui/material'; import { ArrowRight as ArrowRightIcon } from '../../../icons/arrow-right'; import { Scrollbar } from '../../scrollbar'; export const AccountSecuritySettings = () => { const [isEditing, setIsEditing] = useState(false); const handleEdit = () => { setIsEditing(!isEditing); }; return ( <> Change password Multi Factor Authentication Off Authenticator App Use an authenticator app to generate one time security codes. Off Text Message Use your mobile phone to receive security codes via SMS. Login history Your recent login activity: Login type IP Address Client Credentials login on 10:40 AM 2021/09/01 95.130.17.84 Chrome, Mac OS 10.15.7 Credentials login on 10:40 AM 2021/09/01 95.130.17.84 Chrome, Mac OS 10.15.7
); };
